name: Ella (Rodrigo Okamoto, Ian McDonald)
description:
Ella

Oh no! Ella has found herself stranded in outer space on a mighty tall pillar of very profitable materials! Help her dig her way down as you collect coins and upgrade your stats and Ella's stats to increase your pillar destruction efficiency.

Controls

Click on the block below Ella's feet with either Left or Right mouse button to deal damage to it.

Rotate the camera by holding the left mouse button down and moving the mouse.

Upgrade your stats and Ella's stats by clicking on the buttons in the "Ascensions" box.

Have fun by playing the game.

Credits

Ian McDonald - Programming and Animation

Mindy Chi - Art and Design

Rodrigo Okamoto - Programming and Music
